title: Vaishnavi Emerald & Diamond Floral Nakshi Necklace
materials: GH Color). Features traditional Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite necklace features a delicate floral design crafted using traditional Nakshi work, a hallmark of South Indian jewelry. The centerpiece is a stunning floral pendant, adorned with a vibrant round-cut emerald surrounded by sparkling diamonds. The necklace is further embellished with interspersed emerald and diamond set floral motifs, creating a harmonious and captivating design. Its lightweight, flexible design drapes elegantly around the neck.
occasions: and contemporary celebrations. Also a perfect gift for a bride-to-be (Pendli Kuthuru) or for a special anniversary.
description: This Nakshi necklace seamlessly blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern, wearable design. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds enhances its value and adds a touch of regal elegance. The meticulous Nakshi detailing showcases the skill of our master artisans, ensuring that this piece is a treasured heirloom for generations to come. The lightweight design makes it comfortable to wear for extended periods. Symbolizes prosperity, growth, and everlasting love.
